byline.contributor: Benjamin Mueller and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting, and Doris Burke contributed research.
byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER MELE and AL BAKER

lead_paragraph: Keith Walton, who was commanding officer in the 49th Precinct in the Bronx, is accused of abusing the woman in the station house.
snippet: Keith Walton, who was commanding officer in the 49th Precinct in the Bronx, is accused of abusing the woman in the station house....

headline.main: New York Police Inspector Is Charged With Sexually Abusing Female Officer
headline.print_headline: Police Inspector Is Charged  in Sexual Abuse of Officer
